vivae.example

Class MyController

  • java.lang.Object
    • vivae.controllers.VivaeController
      • vivae.controllers.RobotWithSensorController
        • vivae.example.MyController

  • public class MyController
extends RobotWithSensorController
    A sample Controller extending RobotWithSensorController. It's logic is very simple. If it spots a fixed obstacle it turn the opposite way. It's up to you to create more advanced controllers!!
